duties_responsibilities.duty: Taking customer's food and drink orders, serving food and beverages, and preparing itemized checks.
Escorting guests to tables, serving customers seated at counters, setting up and clearing tables, or operating a cash register.
Checking the identification of patrons to ensure they meet the minimum age requirement for the purchase of alcohol.
Providing the highest quality of service to guests in an efficient and courteous manner.
Complying with Aimbridge Hospitality standards and regulations to encourage safe and efficient hotel operations.
Being familiar with the organization of the restaurant and lounge, knowing the function of each job position, and having thorough knowledge of menus and specials in the restaurant.
Servicing guests with all food and beverage requirements in a warm, friendly, courteous, and professional manner.
Clearing, cleaning, and resetting tables as needed, and ensuring that tables and side stands are kept stocked, tidy, and clean.
Carrying out cashiering functions, performing opening and closing procedures, and side work duties according to station rotation assignment.
Performing other assigned tasks/jobs by the supervisor or manager.

education_certification.credential: High School diploma or equivalent, and Alcohol Awareness Certification, and Food Handlers certification.
